pr_title: Emit deprecation warning if multiple v1 templates match with a new index

timeline.message: Emit deprecation warning if multiple v1 templates match with a new index

timeline.bodyText:
minor wording change:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                                    "[{}], it won't be supported with index templates v2", request.index(),
          
          
            
                                    "[{}], and won't be supported with v2 index templates", request.index(),
timeline.author: dakrone

timeline.bodyText:
I think this is a little confusing about what will not be supported and what is not going to be supported going forward, maybe it should be something like:
"index [foo] matches multiple v1 templates [t1, t2], v2 index templates will only match a single index template"
What do you think?
timeline.author: dakrone

replies.bodyText: This is good idea, I've changed it
replies.author: probakowski
